title: RootConfigurationFile
description: Defines the root Sitecore Developer Configuration file

plugins.description:
Contains a list of Sitecore Plugin NugetPackages. The format of the name is [NugetPackageName]@[NugetPackageVersion]. These entries are normally managed using
the 'Sitecore Plugin Add' and 'Sitecore Plugin Remove' commands

defaultMaxRelativeItemPathLength.description:
Max relative item path length to serialize before considering path too long (and requiring aliasing to shorten).
Overridable on a per-module basis; this is the default when it is unspecified.

defaultModuleRelativeSerializationPath.description:
The default relative physical path from a module file where serialized items for that module will be stored.
For example given module /c/foo/bar.module.json, and default '/serialization/items' path,
the serialized items for bar would be stored at /c/foo/bar/serialization/items.
Prefix the path with ~/ for a root configuration relative path instead of a module-relative path.
Use '$(module)' to insert the module name when using a root relative path.
Overridable on a per-module basis; this is the default when it is unspecified.

removeOrphansForRoles.description: Specifies remove orphans functionality for roles serialization

continueOnItemFailure.description: Specifies behavior when item synchronization fails

telemetryEnabled.description: Determines if telemetry is enabled in cli.

versionComparingEnabled.description: Determines if CLI\SMS version comparing is enabled.
